name: TruckStop
description:
Stave off boredom on the open road, picking up coins, coffee and CDs all while avoiding traffic! Purchase upgrades to improve your trucking experience, all while listening to a bangin' soundtrack!

Cotrols:

A and D to switch lanes, press space while up against a car to honk it out of the way. Touching cars puts you in traffic and increases your boredom, which as we all know is clinically fatal.

-Made by Team TruckStop -

Programming - Logon and Zashers

Art - M1G0

Music - Zinnmaster

Game sounds originally from FreeSound.com, modified in Audacity
